name: Junk Fisk Arcade
description:
Enter the intense fishing battle-grounds of Junk Fish Arcade. 

1 or 2 players. It's turn-based so there's minimal stress on your fingers and your mind.

Choose between 5 categories of fish, from the easy, but small, Blap to the near impossible to catch, though massive, Monstax!

No skill required! Just click the button and cross your fingers and hope and wish.

Be a fishing master in this cutting edge free game. 

No animations! Fish art drawn by a developer! No music! No sound effects!
